definition.text: It is a global object available at the browser, containing at runtime a structure of objects ranging from Utilities, Function Libraries, Spaces and others, ready to be accessed and their functions consumed from anywhere within the UI.

paragraphs.text: Left click and Edit to enter edit mode and change this text. ENTER to write new paragraphs. ESC to exit edit mode. Then you can use docs.save to save your changes and app.contribute to send it to the main repository.
